module.p:
When the object of a transitive verb in the progressive is a personal pronoun, it is fused with the ag particle as follows –
gam fhaicinn seeing me
gad fhaicinn seeing you
ga faicinn seeing her/it
ga fhaicinn seeing him/it
gar faicinn seeing us
gur faicinn seeing you
gam faicinn seeing them

Emphasis is expressed using a suffix on the verbal noun –
gam fhaicinn-sa seeing me
gad fhaicinn-sa seeing you
ga faicinn-se seeing her/it
ga fhaicinn-san seeing him/it
gar faicinn-ne seeing us
gur faicinn-se seeing you
gam faicinn-san seeing them

A reflexive pronoun can be emphasised using fhèin as follows –
gam fhaicinn fhìn seeing myself
gad fhaicinn fhèin seeing yourself
ga faicinn fhèin seeing herself/itself
ga fhaicinn fhèin seeing himself/itself
gar faicinn fhèin seeing ourselves
gur faicinn fhèin seeing yourselves
gam faicinn fhèin seeing themselves

Note that forms with an object pronoun after the verbal noun are ungrammatical –
a’ faicinn mi
a’ faicinn ise
a’ faicinn sinn fhèin
